Quest 1 - The Blood Oath.intro:
🧭 INTRO – "Arrival"
Daybreak spills over shattered stone as you crest the rise — five warriors, bound not by coin but by choice. Below, the ruins stir with purpose: tents flutter in the breeze, steel sings in morning drills, and the bones of the old fortress begin to breathe again.

This place looks like home.
At least, to the tents that now occupy it.

“We’re looking for Garath,” one of you mutters.
A nearby merc glances up.
“Command tent’s that way — past the sparring yard.”

You pass through the practice ring — a headmaster barking at recruits, one of them already flat on his back — and make for the command tent.

Inside, lanternlight glows against canvas walls and crumpled maps. Garath stands at the center — proud, weathered, focused. A commander not above his men, but among them.

He turns as you enter, eyes scanning each of you — then glances to Ronald, who stands silently at the side.

“I asked for five,” Garath says. “I got the best five I know.”

He steps forward, placing both hands on the war table.

“We’re carving something new here. A place of power. But first…”

His voice sharpens — not cruel, but carved from command.

“Prove to me you’re worth the iron you carry.”

Path 1.title: 🛡️EXECUTION SQUAD
Path 1.description:
"Train the green recruits under Ronald’s supervision."

The recruits stand in a crooked line, barely holding formation. Mismatched armor, half-strapped buckles, eyes full of nerves.

Ronald doesn’t bark. He just nods toward them and speaks low.
“They won’t last an hour outside these walls.”

He steps back.
“You want to lead? Prove it here — before we get someone killed out there.”

The mercenary camp gathers under dim lanterns. Garath steps onto the central platform, his voice cold and clear:

"Some of you performed admirably. Others... disappointed. Choices matter. Strength matters more. Be ready for what comes next."

The fire crackles.

**The Blood Oath is complete.**
Prepare yourselves for the betrayal to come...

Execution Squad.title: The Execution Squad
Execution Squad.description: Train the green recruits under Ronald's supervision.

Low.text: Training incident injures a recruit. Trust in your leadership falters.

Success.text: Your squad becomes elite NPC backup in later missions.

Failure.text: Ronald files a critical report. Garath takes note.

High.text: You uncover a coded ledger and a secret tunnel.

Low.text: A poison trap wounds one of you.

Success.text: You secure a cache of rare weapons but get arrested in the aftermath.

Failure.text: The guards seize the goods and your reputation suffers.

High.text: You find a locket pointing toward an abandoned mill.

Success.text: You rescue the girl and gain community favor.

Failure.text: You find nothing and suspicion spreads.

Crypts Beneath.title: The Crypts Beneath
Crypts Beneath.description: Investigate strange noises under the arena.

High.text: You discover occult markings and a broken seal.

Low.text: One of you flees into the dark.

Success.text: You slay the creature and claim the tunnels.

Failure.text: Ambush in the dark drains your strength.

Tavern Whisper.title: The Tavern Whisper
Tavern Whisper.description: Uncover rebellion talk at the Bronze Belly Tavern.

Low.text: You offend a noble. A fight breaks out.

Success.text: You gain names of rebel leaders.
